name: ST_DISTANCE
description: Calculates the distance between two geographic points.

examples.title: Distance in meters
examples.sql:
SELECT ST_DISTANCE(location, POINT(2.3522, 48.8566)) as distance_m
FROM stores

examples.title: Filter by distance
examples.sql:
SELECT * FROM restaurants
WHERE ST_DISTANCE(location, POINT(2.3522, 48.8566)) BETWEEN 1 km AND 5 km

examples.title: Order by distance
examples.sql:
SELECT name, ST_DISTANCE(location, POINT(2.3522, 48.8566)) as distance
FROM stores
ORDER BY distance ASC
LIMIT 10

notes: Supported units with filters: mm (millimeters), cm (centimeters), m (meters), km (kilometers), in (inches), ft (feet), yd (yards), mi (miles), nmi (nautical miles)
Uses Haversine formula for great-circle distance
